availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Washington Crabtree (Hopkins County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and house carpenter)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and house carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of John Crabtree and Lucinda Crabtree. Married to Amanda Crabtree. Father of Enos J. Crabtree, Thomas W. Crabtree, and Leonard F. Crabtree. Cabinet maker in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. House carpenter in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 160B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 616.
"William Washington Crabtree (1832-1916)," Find A Grave, Memorial #47104514, accessed November 23, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47104514.
